verses.verse: A Psalm <WH4210> of David <WH1732>. YY <WH3068>, who shall abide <WH1481> <WH8799> in thy tabernacle <WH168>? who shall dwell <WH7931> <WH8799> in thy holy <WH6944> hill <WH2022> ?
He that walketh <WH1980> <WH8802> uprightly <WH8549>, and worketh <WH6466> <WH8802> righteousness <WH6664>, and speaketh <WH1696> <WH8802> the truth <WH571> in his heart <WH3824>.

He that backbiteth <WH7270> <WH8804> not with his tongue <WH3956>, nor doeth <WH6213> <WH8804> evil <WH7451> to his neighbour <WH7453>, nor taketh up <WH5375> <WH8804> a reproach <WH2781> against his neighbour <WH7138>.

In whose eyes <WH5869> a vile person <WH3988> <WH8737> is contemned <WH959> <WH8737>; but he honoureth <WH3513> <WH8762> them that fear <WH3373> the YY <WH3068>. He that sweareth <WH7650> <WH8738> to his own hurt <WH7489> <WH8687>, and changeth <WH4171> <WH8686> not.

He that putteth not out <WH5414> <WH8804> his money <WH3701> to usury <WH5392>, nor taketh <WH3947> <WH8804> reward <WH7810> against the innocent <WH5355>. He that doeth <WH6213> <WH8802> these things shall never <WH5769> be moved <WH4131> <WH8735>.
